title: Instagram : number of brand sponsored influencer posts 2016 to 2020
summary: Overall Annual posts in millions has increased over the Year.
Annual posts in millions is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The line drastically increased by 2.0 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Annual posts in millions, about 4.95 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Annual posts in millions, of value 1.26 was reported at Year 2016
